title: Android 12L beta on Pixel offers no official exit path, but there’s a workaround
content:
Android 12L has been in beta for a few months, but it finally saw its formal release early last week. However, Pixel owners who had enrolled in the Android 12L beta were left with a dilemma, as there was no clear way to exit the beta track. As it turns out, there is a solution.

more…

The post Android 12L beta on Pixel offers no official exit path, but there’s a workaround appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Google's Android 12L Beta got a bit messy with a new beta release and no official exit path, but there is a way to leave without losing data.
